newsitem.title: USA: U.S. base metals and scrap prices - November 5.
newsitem.headline: U.S. base metals and scrap prices - November 5.

text.p: U.S. premiums added to LME official cash settlement price, except for copper, which is added to the COMEX spot month.
Premium includes price for delivery to consumer's works.
Zinc: Special high grade SHG 5.25-6.00 cents/pound
and East coast, delivered to consumer 64-65 cents/pound
Aluminum scrap, Midwest and East coast average price,
Old Sheet and Cast metal 44 to 45 cents/pound
Turnings, clean and dry 44 to 45 cents/pound
Copper scrap, Midwest and East coast average price,
Lead batteries, delivered consumer 4.0 to 6.0 cents/pound
Alcan aluminum, U.S. Midwest (effective date: Nov 1, 1996)
RSR pure lead price (effective date: March 20, 1996)
Doe Run pure lead price (effective date: August 14, 1996)
